R

readInputClauses() - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
reads the disjunctions, the atleast, atmost, exactly and interval clauses from the normalizer and transfroms them to Clauses.
removeClause(Clause, boolean, boolean) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
removes the clause from the internal lists and sets the task's clause to null;
removeClause(Clause, boolean, Literals, boolean) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
removes the clause from the internal lists.
removeClausesSubsumedByLongerClause(Clause) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
removes all clauses subsumed by the given clause.
removedLiterals - Variable in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
for collecting literals.
removeLiteralFromClause(Literal) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
removes the literal from the clause and from the corresponding index.
removeLongerClausesSubsumedByBinaryClause(Clause) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
removes all longer disjunctions which are subsumed by a binary subsumer.
replaceLiteral(Literal, int, Literals, InferenceStep) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
replaces the literal (in literalObject) by another literal (representative), typically equivalence replacement.
Resolution - Class in Solvers.Resolution
This is an incomplete solver which tries to simplify the clauses as far as possible and to derive true literals to be sent to other solvers.
Resolution(int, HashMap<String, Object>) - Constructor for class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
constructs a new Simplifier.
Resolution(int, Monitor, boolean, IntSupplier) - Constructor for class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
this is a constructor for testing purposes (without ProblemSupervisor)
resolve(Literal, Literal, boolean, String) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
creates a resolvent between the clauses with the two literals.
